title: National Supercomputing Centers
description: The establishment of National Supercomputing Centers through federal initiatives, such as the National Supercomputing Act, is detailed. This funding effort equipped universities like the University of Illinois with cutting-edge supercomputers, including Cray and Thinking Machines systems, shaping the groundwork for future advancements in technology and internet infrastructure.
